perturbation.original_text: Party A: Dazzle Interactive Network Technologies Co., Ltd. Address: 4F, Han Zhong Hua Mansion, 268 Han Zhong Road, Gu Lou District, Nanjing Zip code: 210001 Contact person: Chen Xi Tel:    Name of account: Dazzle Interactive Network Technologies Co., Ltd Deposit Bank: China Merchants Bank, Chengbei Sub-branch, Nanjing A/C:
perturbation.changed_text: Client: Dazzle Interactive Network Technologies Co., Ltd. Address: 4F, Han Zhong Hua Mansion, 268 Han Zhong Road, Gu Lou District, Nanjing Zip code: 210001 Contact person: Chen Xi Tel:    Name of account: Dazzle Interactive Network Technologies Co., Ltd Deposit Bank: China Merchants Bank, Chengbei Sub-branch, Nanjing A/C:
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Party A' is changed to 'Client'. This introduces inconsistency because the contract continues to use 'Party A' in other sections, creating ambiguity about whether 'Client' and 'Party A' refer to the same entity.

perturbation.original_text: 2.1 Party A shall have a preemptive right to carry out mobile game services with Party B on a nationwide basis.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.1 The Customer shall have a preemptive right to carry out mobile game services with Party B on a nationwide basis.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing “Party A” with “Customer” creates confusion because the document still uses “Party A” in other sections. This makes it uncertain whether “Customer” and “Party A” are intended to be the same legal entity, affecting enforcement of rights and obligations.

perturbation.original_text: 10.7 If Party A discovers that Party B has violated the Integrity Agreement attached hereto by bribing Party A's working personnel, Party A may elect to impose a penalty of RMB10,000 to 100,000, suspend cooperation for 1-3 years or terminate the cooperation depending on the seriousness of the violation and the consequences thus brought about, and any loss thus incurred to Party A shall be borne by Party B.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.7 If the Service Provider discovers that Party B has violated the Integrity Agreement attached hereto by bribing the Service Provider's working personnel, the Service Provider may elect to impose a penalty of RMB10,000 to 100,000, suspend cooperation for 1-3 years or terminate the cooperation depending on the seriousness of the violation and the consequences thus brought about, and any loss thus incurred to the Service Provider shall be borne by Party B.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Party A' to 'Service Provider' creates uncertainty. It is unclear whether the contract intends 'Service Provider' to be synonymous with 'Party A,' or if it's a separate entity, which affects who has the right to impose penalties, creating potential enforcement issues.
